title: Analysis of Print vs. Digital Resource Preferences in University Libraries: Mobile-Based Statistical Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts and experience using mobile devices
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, integrated with language learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more demographic factors influencing preferences for university library resources.
Learners can collect and analyze survey data in mobile environments and apply chi-square tests.
Learners can write a report comparing and analyzing differences in preferences for print and digital materials across situational contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
